Summary Note:
Weber Kägi Gmür and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Zürich. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Weber Kägi Gmür is a seasoned professional with over 27 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Weber Kägi Gmür is currently divorced. He has 2 kids called Lea and Roth.
Education Background:
Weber graduated from École secondaire de La Chaux-de-Fonds Neuchâtel in 1993.
Weber received his degree from Bern University of Applied Sciences in 1998.
Occupation History:
Weber Kägi Gmür is a 51 year old and comes from Switzerland.
At Varo Energy AG, Weber Kägi Gmür held the position of Drilling Engineer from 1998 to 2002, developing essential skills in the field.
His subsequent role was as a Reservoir Engineer at Petrolift AG, where he continued to grow professionally from 2002 to 2007.
His tenure as a Operations Manager at Swisspetro AG from 2007 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1240000 CHF, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has villa located in Kreuzlingen, worth 4990000 CHF.


Following the passing of his grandfather, a successful Neurosurgeon, he received an inheritance of 120000 CHF in 2013, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
